document_data.name: Myer Ravenshade
document_data.mainbody:
Lord '''Myer Ravenshade''' was a member of the [[Parliament of Peers]] from the noble [[patriar]] [[Ravenshade]] family of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|Thank the living gods Gortash is here to protect us.|Lord Myer Ravenshade}}
document_data.Description: Myer Ravenshade was a [[dwarf]]<ref group="note">Despite his race being indicated as [[human]], Baldur's Gate III uses a model of a male dwarf for Raylen Jannath. man with a dark skin tone, dark brown eyes, and black hair. He kept his scalp clean-shaven and beared â€“ well-trimmed. Myer worse finery embroidered in gold and an ornate fanciful [[circlet]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, shortly before the armies of the [[the Absolute]] attacked the Gate, Lord Myer Ravenshade voted in support of crowning lowborn Lord [[Enver Gortash]] as the city's Archduke. Myer was present for Gortash's coronation that took place in the audience hall of [[Wyrm's Rock]]. Following the coronation, he proudly proclaimed his support for Gortash' accession, stating the new Archduke was there to protect them and that the nobility was safe behind the city walls.. In a conversation with Lord [[Raylen Jannath]], Myer voiced his approval of the [[steel watcher]]s and stated that as long as Baldur's Gate doesn't let refugees in, they would have enough supplies to outlast any danger.
